description: This file defines a Flutter screen widget for the admin orders management interface. It includes UI components such as headers, placeholders, and responsive layouts, and references external theme and responsive classes.

classes.name: AdminOrdersManagementScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the admin orders management screen with a header and placeholder items.

classes.name: _NeonSectionHeader
classes.description: A private widget for rendering styled header sections with icons and titles.

classes.name: _NeonPlaceholder
classes.description: A private widget for rendering placeholder UI blocks with an icon and descriptive text.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the main layout of the admin orders management screen, adapting to screen size with responsive design.
